data.description: <p style="text-align:left"><b><i><span>Welcome to Warner Bros. Discovery… the stuff dreams are made of.</span></i></b></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><b><span>Who We Are… </span></b></p><p style="text-align:left"><span>When we say, “the stuff dreams are made of,” we’re not just referring to the world of wizards, dragons and superheroes, or even to the wonders of Planet Earth. Behind WBD’s vast portfolio of iconic content and beloved brands, are the <i>storytellers</i> bringing our characters to life, the<i> creators</i> bringing them to your living rooms and the <i>dreamers</i> creating what’s next…</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><span>From brilliant creatives, to technology trailblazers, across the globe, WBD offers career defining opportunities, thoughtfully curated benefits, and the tools to explore and grow into your best selves. Here you are supported, here you are celebrated, here you can thrive.</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p><b>Sports Production and Design Internships: ATL - Summer 2026</b></p><p></p><div><div><p><b><span>Application Deadline:</span><span><span> </span></span><span>Sunday</span><span>,<span> </span></span><span>February 22</span></b><b><span>nd</span></b><b><span>*</span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>*</span><span>Pro Tip:<span> </span></span><span>S</span><span>ubmit</span><span><span> </span></span><span>your application as soon as possible – applications could close earlier due to applicant<span> </span></span><span>volume!*</span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><u><span>Your New Role</span></u><span> </span></b></p></div><div><p><span><span>Overview of the internships</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>We have multiple </span></span><b>Sports Production and Design </b><span><span>internship opportunities available. By applying to this posting, you will be<span> </span></span><span>considered for</span><span><span> </span>multiple internship opportunities within this general area.<span> </span></span><span>These internships will<span> </span></span><span>be located in</span><span><span> </span>the ATL area.</span><span><span> </span>The selected interns will be expected to join us in the office on a regular<span> </span></span><span>cadence</span><span><span> </span>based on the intern<span> </span></span><span>manager’s<span> </span>in office schedule.</span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>Example internship opportunities could include:</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><div><ul><li><p>TNT Sports Broadcast Design Intern: ATL - Summer 2026</p></li><li><p>TNT Sports Intern: ATL - Summer 2026</p></li></ul></div></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div></div><div><div><p><b><u><span>Your Role Accountabilities</span></u><span> </span></b></p></div><div><p><span><span>Duties could include:</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p>Observe, train, participate and gain first-hand experience of the production and post production of studio shows</p></li><li><p>Assist with highlight reels & player packages as well as provide content for the ticker</p></li></ul></div><div><p></p><ul><li><p>Compile, edit & log historically team/player reels for MLB, NHL and U.S. Soccer for digital and social platforms</p></li><li><p>Observing, training and participating in the production of live studio telecast.</p></li><li><p>Helping manage the footage library including compiling, evaluating, and logging video for all Turner Sports properties.</p></li><li><p>Gain experience in post-production fundamentals: editing, sound design and visual effects.</p></li><li><p>Cross collaborate with a variety of departments including production, social media, library, marketing, talent services and Creative Sports Services Unit (CSSU)</p></li></ul><span> </span></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><u><span>Qualifications & Experience</span></u><span> </span></b></p></div><div><p><span><span>Essentials needed for the positions that are similar across the above roles (these do not all have to apply to every single role) </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p>Strong knowledge of sports</p></li><li><p>Ability to work in a creative, team-orientated and fast-paced environment</p></li><li><p>Experience working in television production</p></li><li><p>Experience with writing for sports</p></li><li><p>Proactive, creative, enthusiastic and adaptable</p></li><li><p>Editing skills & experience with Adobe Premiere or Final Cut, preferred</p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Must be actively enrolled in an accredited college or university degree program for the full duration of the internship (proof of enrollment<span> </span></span><span>required</span><span>) </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Must be a rising Junior or rising Senior undergrad student (18 years or older) </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Must be in academic good standing (3.0 or above GPA)</span><span><span> </span>A transcript</span><span><span> </span>will be<span> </span></span><span>required</span><span><span> </span>to verify your GPA if an offer is extended.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Warner Bros. Discovery will only consider candidates who are presently authorized to work for any employer in the United States and who will not require work visa sponsorship from Warner Bros. Discovery now or in the future<span> </span></span><span>in order to</span><span><span> </span></span><span>retain</span><span><span> </span>their authorization to work in the United States. Candidates currently on any student or exchange visa, including F-1 CPT, F-1 OPT, J-1, M-1, etc., will not be eligible for the internship program.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><u><span>What To Know Before Applying:</span></u><span> </span></b></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>The duration of the summer program regardless of which start/end<span> </span></span><span>option</span><span><span> </span>is<span> </span></span><span>11 weeks</span><span>. </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Program date options:</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span><span>Option 1: June</span><span><span> </span>1</span></span><span><span>st</span></span><span><span> </span><span><span> </span>–</span><span><span> </span>August 1</span><span>4</span></span><span><span>th</span></span><span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>Option 2: June<span> </span></span><span>8</span></span><span><span>th</span></span><span><span><span> </span>– August 2</span><span>1</span></span><span><span>st</span></span><span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p></div></div><div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Interns will be expected to work<span> </span></span><span>35-40</span><span><span> </span>hours per week in a<span> </span></span></span><b><span>hybrid capacity</span></b><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Our internships are paid opportunities with a competitive hourly wage. Credit is not<span> </span></span><span>required</span><span>; however, we will provide the necessary documentation for school credit if desired. Relocation is not provided. </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Interviewing will take place from<span> </span></span><span>mid February</span><span> </span><span><span> </span>through<span> </span></span><span>early-</span><span>April</span><span>. A WBD team member will contact you if your experiences and interests match an open internship position.<span> </span></span><span>Due to the high volume of applications, we are unable to give individual status updates.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>On December 5, Netflix and Warner Bros. Discovery announced they have entered into a definitive agreement under which Netflix will acquire Warner Bros., including its film and television studios, HBO Max and HBO.</span><span><span> </span>The transaction is expected to close after the separation of Warner Bros. Discovery's Global Networks division, Discovery Global, into a new<span> </span></span><span>publicly-traded</span><span><span> </span>company, which is expected to be completed in Q3 2026. For more details, including leadership appointments and information on individual brands, please visit our newsroom </span></span><a href="https://nam11.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wbd.com%2Fnews%2Fwarner-bros-discovery-announces-post-separation-company-names-and-leadership-appointments&data=05%7C02%7CJessica.Loftus%40wbd.com%7Cfb80e6d529694aecf09b08de5f804a51%7C0eb48825e8714459bc72d0ecd68f1f39%7C0%7C0%7C639053201763773855%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=FYdLkE9V1V0HkYTxngzLDZuh5JyvGpysQaCzfdSFQxk%3D&reserved=0" target="_blank"><span><span>here</span></span></a><span><span>.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Although you will be hired by Warner Bros. Discovery, upon the planned spin-off of Discovery Global in 2026, your employment<span> </span></span><span>likely will</span><span> transition to Warner Bros. (or) transition to Discovery Global. During this period of transformation,<span> </span></span><span>you’ll</span><span><span> </span>have an exciting opportunity to lay the foundation at one of the world’s premier entertainment brands.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>About Our Internship Program</span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>WBD's Internship Program is designed to nurture students professionally and personally. We attract the country’s boldest and brightest students for<span> </span></span><span>paid,</span><span><span> </span>for-credit, real-world internship experiences in the entertainment, tech, sports,<span> </span></span><span>news</span><span><span> </span>and media industries. We offer career-defining opportunities to learn valuable skills that will help you prepare for a successful future. </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span> </span></span><br /><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>Ready to learn more?<span> </span></span><span>Here’s</span><span><span> </span>what we offer:</span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Hands-on work with passionate, talented team members in your field</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Mentorship from some of the industry’s kindest and most passionate entertainment veterans</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Engaging events including professional development seminars, panels with recruiters and former interns, intern-exclusive events, and so much<span> </span></span><span>more</span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Access to top-level executives and employees through our Speaker Series and Roundtables</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Incredible networking opportunities with industry-leading professionals and a robust intern alumni network</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div></div><div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>A creative, collaborative, and inclusive company culture </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span><span> </span></span><br /><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>What you can expect to take away from the semester:</span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Opportunities to develop professionally and uncover skills you<span> </span></span><span>didn’t</span><span><span> </span>know you<span> </span></span><span>had</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>The insider scoop on the entertainment industry and what happens behind the<span> </span></span><span>scenes</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Relationships that will go beyond your collegiate<span> </span></span><span>career</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Real-life experiences that will provide you with the confidence to delve into your next<span> </span></span><span>adventure</span></span><b><span> </span></b><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span> </span></span></p></div><div><p><i><span>In compliance with local law, we are<span> </span></span><span>disclosing</span><span><span> </span></span><span>compensation</span><span><span> </span>for roles in locations where legally required.</span><span><span> </span>Pay Rate: $19 per hour USD for<span> </span></span><span>undergrad</span><span><span> </span>interns.</span></i></p></div></div><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p><b><span>How We Get Things Done…</span></b></p><p></p><p><span>This last bit is probably the most important! Here at WBD, our guiding principles are the core values by which we operate and are central to how we get things done. You can find them at </span><a href="http://www.wbd.com/guiding-principles/" target="_blank"><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span><span>www.wbd.com/guiding-principles/</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></a><span> along with some insights from the team on what they mean and how they show up in their day to day. We hope they resonate with you and look forward to discussing them during your interview.</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><b><span>Championing Inclusion at WBD</span></b></p>Warner Bros. Discovery embraces the opportunity to build a workforce that reflects a wide array of perspectives, backgrounds and experiences. Being an equal opportunity employer means that we take seriously our responsibility to consider qualified candidates on the basis of merit, without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, mental or physical disability, and genetic information, marital status, citizenship status, military status, protected veteran status or any other category protected by law.<p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><span>If you’re a qualified candidate with a disability and you require adjustments or accommodations during the job application and/or recruitment process, please visit our </span><a href="https://careers.wbd.com/global/en/accessibility" target="_blank">accessibility page</a><span> for instructions to submit your request.</span></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p>
